This is the most pain he's ever felt from any injury he's had, Gary Moore said.`` He's been in tremendous agony.'' The Labour leader, Eamon Gilmore , said the Irish people did not want the government to remain in office another day. It is simply not tenable for Brian Cowen to remain on as taoiseach as his colleagues in Fi?nna Fail squabble over the remnants of their party, he said. Irish prime minister Brian Cowen resigns as party leader 15.11 GMT on Saturday 22 January 2011.
